result.eng: Although slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ga: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.orig: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.html: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ponchtml: Cé nárḃ é an scláḃaíoċt an t-aon ċúis le cogaḋ caṫarṫa na Stát Aontaiṫe ba ċeist lárnaċ íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
